DroidBench.Author: Serval, SnT, University of Luxembourg
DroidBench.Description: The different extra keys are used to test whether the analysis tools are able to distinguish them or not. This case does not contain any leaks, if a tool reports leaks in this case, false results are alarmed.
DroidBench.Challenge: To distinguish the extra keys of Intents. More specifically, one of the extra keys is built by complicated string operations (e.g., StringBuilder).
